channel.title: Inactive Accounts?
channel.description: How easy do you think it would be to recover inactive account's without there previous password's? I have a 2001 HS list, and I was just wondering.

item.title: Inactive Accounts?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:29, topic:405436”][quote author=…::Coded::… link=topic=502422.msg3676994#msg3676994 date=1311300483]

Jagex’s policy no returns after a scam etc?

Jagex has many policies they do not follow :rolleyes:

Very true actually, and they dont have to follow them anyways since they own the game. Glad they gave her it back, that would have been gutting.

It wasn’t returned they said it themself
[/quote]
They also said they’re getting rid of bots, but that’s not happening, is it?[/quote]
Its just to keep players happy, they get rid of the worst botters (suicide botters) to stop the economy getting even worse than it is but they make a fair bit of money from membership of botting accounts.
They could get rid of a majority of botters, fuck knows why they don’t :/.
I bot, but I wouldn’t rage if I got deleted as I know I would deserve it (I don’t bot to the max I bot a few hours a day) there has been many times when my bots have fucked up. It should be obvious that I bot.

Read full topic

That chessy018 got the inactive account recovery scam… My friend linked me it, looked pretty legit.
You see her raging on rs and on rs forums about her rajing to jagex about them not giving her bank back after they banned the hacker.
Bit of a dumbass xferring it all to his account lawl.
[/quote]Chessy is one of the richest players on RS

Not anymore.
[/quote]What happened?

Did you read the post you quoted?[/quote]I did but I noticed my reply was stupid.

item.title: Inactive Accounts?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

You won’t get shit since most of the recoveries are automated and you get a response email almost immediately after recovering an account, whether it’s been accepted or not.
